thread.title: German Delegation Due in Iran for “New Chapter” in Trade, Energy Ties

title: German Delegation Due in Iran for “New Chapter” in Trade, Energy Ties
text:
German Delegation Due in Iran for “New Chapter” in Trade, Energy Ties Sep 16, 2015 
TEHRAN (FNA)- The Iranian nuclear agreement opens the way for a new chapter in German-Iranian business relations including petrochemical and energy ties, German deputy economic minister Matthias Machnig said. The July 19 Iran visit by German Economic Minister Sigmar Gabriel symbolized the opening of new chapter in bilateral business ties, Machnig told a business conference hosted … ( continue reading ) Energy Press Releases L-3 MAPPS to Deliver Severe Accident Simulator to Westinghouse for Project in Japan Sep 17, 2015 Get Breaking Energy Technology News by Email.
